packages.//comment: this level represents the folders for which you want to have tags created

tier3.//comment1: package-name represents the first part of the tag
tier3.//comment2: tag-separator represents the middle part of the tag. The semVer will be added right after it.

tier4.//comment1: package-name represents the first part of the tag
tier4.//comment2: tag-separator represents the middle part of the tag. The semVer will be added right after it.
